hero-text: We partner with ambitious businesses and professionals to unlock growth through tailored HR solutions, recruitment intelligence, and workforce strategy.

story.title: Who We Are
story.description: Backed by 15+ years of regional HR leadership, Reference Agency delivers expert support in technology hiring, HR consultancy, and outsourcing. We work closely with growth-focused companies in Egypt, KSA, UAE—and soon across the wider MENA region—to solve their most critical HR challenges and build high-performing teams. More than filling roles, we design scalable, people-centered strategies that fuel long-term business success.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Driven by Partnership, powered by Agility, defined by Excellence, and anchored in Integrity—we bring purpose to every step of the HR journey.
